Uses of Class
org.apache.juneau.commons.collections.Maps

Packages that use Maps
Package
Description
org.apache.juneau.commons.collections
Enhanced collection utilities that extend the standard Java Collections Framework with fluent APIs, specialized collection types, and caching capabilities.
org.apache.juneau.commons.utils
Common internal utilities.
org.apache.juneau.internal
Internal Utilities

    Method
    Description
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.add(K key, V value)
    Adds a single entry to this map.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.addAll(Map<K,V> value)
    Appends the contents of the specified map into this map.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.addAny(Object... values)
    Adds arbitrary values to this map.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.addPairs(Object... pairs)
    Adds a list of key/value pairs to this map.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.concurrent()
    When specified, build() will return a thread-safe map.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.concurrent(boolean value)
    Sets whether build() should return a thread-safe map.
    static <K, V> Maps<K,V>
    Maps.create()
    Static creator without explicit type parameters.
    static <K, V> Maps<K,V>
    Maps.create(Class<K> keyType, Class<V> valueType)
    Static creator.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.filtered()
    Applies a default filter that excludes common "empty" or "unset" values from being added to the map.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.filtered(BiPredicate<K,V> filter)
    Applies a filter predicate to entries when building the map.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.functions(Function<Object,K> keyFunction, Function<Object,V> valueFunction)
    Sets both key and value conversion functions.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.keyFunction(Function<Object,K> keyFunction)
    Sets the key conversion function for converting keys in addAny(Object...).
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.ordered()
    When specified, build() will use a LinkedHashMap to preserve insertion order.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.ordered(boolean value)
    Sets whether build() should use a LinkedHashMap to preserve insertion order.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.sorted()
    Converts the set into a SortedMap.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.sorted(Comparator<K> comparator)
    Converts the set into a SortedMap using the specified comparator.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.sparse()
    When specified, the build() method will return null if the map is empty.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.unmodifiable()
    When specified, build() will return an unmodifiable map.
    Maps<K,V>
    Maps.valueFunction(Function<Object,V> valueFunction)
    Sets the value conversion function for converting values in addAny(Object...).
